title: Can anyone point out how this chatlog = permaban lmao.
body:
If someone could point out where in this chat log Riot found a reason to Perma Ban me after 3 Polish premades reported me.
That'd be very appreciated. (We even won the game, after I camped our botlane, secured all drakes and split pushed 2 lanes and backdoored 3 inhibs)
(Only reason they reported me is cause I pinged Nasus to defend my Blue buff at start, and he lost it after I pinged him twice to go defend blue. 
And then all 3 of them started flaming me 24/7 and refused to leash & help with drakes, or help me when I was fighting someone next to them)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Support on Drugs: Defend it.
Support on Drugs: Fine
Support on Drugs: Go afk then. Don't just /ff and be negative
Support on Drugs: Janna
Support on Drugs: come take his blue
Support on Drugs: Quite late
Support on Drugs: he took it
Support on Drugs: Maybe I just want free gold.
Support on Drugs: bronze Nasus
Support on Drugs: No
Support on Drugs: Jungle tip number 1 from all high elo Jungle players
Support on Drugs: Fuck losers, focus on winners.
Support on Drugs: Never waste time helping a feeder.
Support on Drugs: Focus on winning lanes
Support on Drugs: lmao
Support on Drugs: Rep for what? not intentionally feeding like you?
Support on Drugs: But I've done 10x more useful things, unlike you. I took 3 turrets, carried bot and mid.
Support on Drugs: All you've done is cry & feed.
Support on Drugs: Lost game? 
Support on Drugs: We're winning hard.
Support on Drugs: Rep me? what about you lol 1/11/0
Support on Drugs: Negative attitude.
Support on Drugs: Lmao
Support on Drugs: Says the person who has been trying to surrender since game started.
Support on Drugs: You're the one tilting entire team
Support on Drugs: But I haven't flamed once lmao
Support on Drugs: However, these 3 premades
Support on Drugs: Boy
Support on Drugs: No I'm not lol
Support on Drugs: report Nasus
Support on Drugs: int feed
Support on Drugs: And you :D
Support on Drugs: Toxic & Negative attitude.
Support on Drugs: + Griefing
Support on Drugs: And assisting enemy team.
Support on Drugs: lmao
Support on Drugs: I'm the only reason you won bot lane.
Support on Drugs: You were pushed in and losing entire early.
Support on Drugs: I had to camp you guys hard.
Support on Drugs: But I haven't flamed once lmao
Support on Drugs: Unlike you
Support on Drugs: When did I argue with him?
Support on Drugs: If you can answer that, then sure.
Support on Drugs: Nope
Support on Drugs: Not once.
Support on Drugs: Nope lol
Support on Drugs: I was 3/2/5 before this Nasus managed to feed everyone on enemy team.
Support on Drugs: Rep you
Support on Drugs: Idno what that is
Support on Drugs: What language is that?
Support on Drugs: What does it mean.
Support on Drugs: It's not in any dictionary
Support on Drugs: xPeke
Support on Drugs: This Lee lol
Support on Drugs: So many Mountain Drakes
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Quite fucked up, that 3 Polish premades can get you permabanned for pinging Nasus TWICE. to go defend blue while I start Red buff. 
Played the game for 8 years, spent easily over $3500 on the game in those 8 years. 
And then  I get Perma banned for... For what exactly? 
Prior to this, I did get 2 week suspension after leaving few games in a row thx to shitty internet.   And then 2 weeks after that suspension ended, I get into a classic EUNE game, where I'm matched into a team with 3 drunk Polish guys doing their best to be toxic & ruin the game for everyone. And then reporting every1 from that game.

replies.body:
Once you have a 14-day ban, the next punishment (unless you have enough good behavior to restore your account's standing) is a permanent ban.

This sort of behavior is not considered acceptable. You don't need to belittle your teammates or blame them incessantly, even if something IS their fault. It doesn't help, and just makes the game environment worse for everyone.

> [{quoted}](name=Support on Drugs,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-07T23:35:12.159+0000) Support on Drugs: bronze Nasus
> Support on Drugs: Fuck losers, focus on winners.
> Support on Drugs: But I've done 10x more useful things, unlike you. I took 3 turrets, carried bot and mid.
> Support on Drugs: All you've done is cry & feed.
> Support on Drugs: Rep me? what about you lol 1/11/0
> Support on Drugs: You're the one tilting entire team
> Support on Drugs: I was 3/2/5 before this Nasus managed to feed everyone on enemy team.

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-07T23:43:45.227+0000)
>
> Once you have a 14-day ban, the next punishment (unless you have enough good behavior to restore your account's standing) is a permanent ban.
> 
> This sort of behavior is not considered acceptable. You don't need to belittle your teammates or blame them incessantly, even if something IS their fault. It doesn't help, and just makes the game environment worse for everyone.

the ''Bronze Nasus'' Was because all 3 of them were spamming I'm bronze, because they used Porofessor or smth, to notice It was my first game with Kha. (In season8, have played him few times before in other seasons)  And I didn't have a Border in Flex. Apparently not having played Flex in s7  nullifies the fact I'm Plat 3 in SoloQ and they can spam ''Bronze Kha'' ''Noob kha bronze report'' ''First time kha report bronze'' 

So I was just replying casually ''Bronze Nasus'' to the 20+ chats of ''Bronze Kha'' that the Top, mid and support were spamming. 

''F**k losers, focus on winners'' Wasn't directed at them. It's a quote from literally any Jungle coach & guide I've come across. 
''F**k losers, focus on winners. Someone who already lost isn't going to win you the game, at best he'll surive until late and then It's 50/50 while snowballing the player/s who are already fed will allow them to carry'' 

Then I just stated that the 3 of them calling me Useless, was quite stupid. Considering I had snowballed our botlane into a hyper fed J!nx and Janna. 
Allowing us to win the teamfights, + I had taken 3 turrets by myself. Aswell as I then took the inhibs in a backdoor. And I got all 4 drakes that spawned in that game. (Quite gr8 drakes too, 3 Mountain, 1 infernal) 

Janna had been tilting entire team since start.  
Since 2 minutes into the game, she kept being toxic, afk'ing, spamming surrender votes, and more.

You aren't a jungle coach.  You are a player.  You are a player at the same level as the others on your team.  And, quite frankly, if I had a coach tell me that, I would lose... pretty much all respect for them.  It's not appropriate, especially in game.  You are, effectively, telling that player they are a loser and not worth your time or effort.  And saying *in game* is even worse because you are also blatantly saying you won't help your teammate.  So why should any of your *other* teammates trust that you will help them?

What your teammates say is on them.  If they are trying to tilt you and you fire back?  Congrats, you just gave them *exactly what they wanted*:  A reaction, a reason to blame you (instead of taking responsibility for their own actions and chat, which they won't do anyway), and a potentially valid report.  You just fell for the nuclear option.  It's an attitude of "If I'm getting punished, I'm going to take as many others with me as I can."

> [{quoted}](name=AJStarhiker,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-08T00:22:11.758+0000)
>
> You aren't a jungle coach.  You are a player.  You are a player at the same level as the others on your team.  And, quite frankly, if I had a coach tell me that, I would lose... pretty much all respect for them.  It's not appropriate, especially in game.  You are, effectively, telling that player they are a loser and not worth your time or effort.  And saying *in game* is even worse because you are also blatantly saying you won't help your teammate.  So why should any of your *other* teammates trust that you will help them?

Except, we're not players of the same level. I'm G3 in flex. 
(Never played Flex until S8 so I placed low there due to no previous mmr there + I don't play my Mains in Flex. Prefer climbing Flex with my off picks) 
And  Plat 3 in soloQ. And, the Nasus that had been Intentionally feeding and trolling since 2:00 of game. Is Silver 3 and has been bronze/silver his entire league career.  So no, we're not at the same level. Only reason he was in that elo, is because his 2 teammates were gold 4 & 3 in Flex. 


Also, why would I effectively waste my time, going top lane. Where Nasus already went ahead and gave Urgot a huge amount of kills in under 15 minutes INTENTIONALLY. Simply because I pinged him 2 times and asked him to go defend my blue buff while I started Red buff.  
To which he responded to with toxicity from him & his friends, and him going straight to feeding for no reason.

While I would be top side, Lee would've had free reign to clear out my botside jungle, kill my mid laner, roam with his mid laner to bot. Clear them out, take turret. And drake. 
And what could I have done instead?
Oh right, gone 1v1 with a super fed Urgot while Nasus afk's under his turret for the 100th time.

So no. 
I went botside instead, and camped my Bot, camped Lee's jungle, took all drakes, until J!nx ended up with 21 kills by the end of the game.
Barely winning us the game. So I'm quite sure she could ''Trust'' that I was helping her.

And not once in that Chat log do I flame any1. 
I'm not telling anyone to K themselves, Not being homophobic, (which wouldn't make sense since a lot my family & friends are bi/gay) Not telling anyone to F themselves or F off.  Even though Nasus & Janna were acting & playing like it, not once did I call them worthless garbage. 

Worst thing I did? I QUOTED. A QUOTE.  It's literally in quotation marks, so that even a Bot would understand that I'm not saying it to the player, but referring to a quote. When I said ''F losers, focus on the winners'' I was referring to what  an Ex-challenger Coach told me that when I asked him about his opinion on what to do in case one lane is losing insanely hard. Should I babysit that one, or focus on map pressure, objectives & other lanes. 

Other than that one ''F losers''  there isn't any flame in there.

> [{quoted}](name=Support on Drugs,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-03-08T03:20:35.334+0000)
>
> Except, we're not players of the same level. I'm G3 in flex. 
> (Never played Flex until S8 so I placed low there due to no previous mmr there + I don't play my Mains in Flex. Prefer climbing Flex with my off picks) 
> And  Plat 3 in soloQ. And, the Nasus that had been Intentionally feeding and trolling since 2:00 of game. Is Silver 3 and has been bronze/silver his entire league career.  So no, we're not at the same level. Only reason he was in that elo, is because his 2 teammates were gold 4 & 3 in Flex. 

If you don't take the format seriously, isn't that even less reason to harass someone about *their* skill level?  Each queue rank has to be earned separately.  If you are playing outside your comfort zone, *of course* you will play at a lower skill level than your main.  You  have to learn the new champion and/or position to earn the same skill level as your main.
 
> Also, why would I effectively waste my time, going top lane. Where Nasus already went ahead and gave Urgot a huge amount of kills in under 15 minutes INTENTIONALLY. Simply because I pinged him 2 times and asked him to go defend my blue buff while I started Red buff.  
> To which he responded to with toxicity from him & his friends, and him going straight to feeding for no reason.

You told him to afk.  Do you really think that wasn't flaming?

> While I would be top side, Lee would've had free reign to clear out my botside jungle, kill my mid laner, roam with his mid laner to bot. Clear them out, take turret. And drake. 
> And what could I have done instead?
> Oh right, gone 1v1 with a super fed Urgot while Nasus afk's under his turret for the 100th time.
> 
> So no. 
> I went botside instead, and camped my Bot, camped Lee's jungle, took all drakes, until J!nx ended up with 21 kills by the end of the game.
> Barely winning us the game. So I'm quite sure she could ''Trust'' that I was helping her.

So don't go top if you think you can help your team more by staying bot for Dragon control and snowballing your ADC.  But you keep harping on Top's failings.  And apparently expanded to include players you believed/knew to be premade with him.

> And not once in that Chat log do I flame any1. 
> I'm not telling anyone to K themselves, Not being homophobic, (which wouldn't make sense since a lot my family & friends are bi/gay) Not telling anyone to F themselves or F off.  Even though Nasus & Janna were acting & playing like it, not once did I call them worthless garbage. 

Not those specific words, no.  But you implied it with your "F Losers" comment and you kept accuse him of intentially feeding and not contributing to the team.  Maybe he was doing that, but it's not your responsibility to point out everyone else's shortcomings as players.

> Worst thing I did? I QUOTED. A QUOTE.  It's literally in quotation marks, so that even a Bot would understand that I'm not saying it to the player, but referring to a quote. When I said ''F losers, focus on the winners'' I was referring to what  an Ex-challenger Coach told me that when I asked him about his opinion on what to do in case one lane is losing insanely hard. Should I babysit that one, or focus on map pressure, objectives & other lanes. 

Anyone can claim they are quoting someone.  And maybe they are.  It doesn't mean the quote is acceptable in a game setting.  If throwing quotation marks around something made it exempt from a ban (BTW, you didn't even do that much), than anyone could put them around racial slurs, suicide calls, and blatant harassment with no repercussions.

> Other than that one ''F losers''  there isn't any flame in there.

TBH, you seem to have a superiority complex regarding players who don't match up to your expectations.  You flame them by pointing out their failings.

I work with someone like that.  Never swears, never yells, but is constantly telling everyone else what their job is and how to do it.  It's not their responsibility and, not only does it make the job unpleasent, they are wasting time they could use to do *their* job and everyone else's time by putting them behind schedule.  I wish I could use LoL's mute/report features in RL.  It would make working there less sucky.

You devoted a large amount of your chat to one player, pointing out whenever they did something bad in order to insult them. You were more interested in insulting teammates than in playing the game. This line:

>Support on Drugs: But I haven't flamed once lmao

Is simply not true.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-08T01:18:55.143+0000)
>
> You devoted a large amount of your chat to one player, pointing out whenever they did something bad in order to insult them. You were more interested in insulting teammates than in playing the game. This line:
> 
> Is simply not true.

Then can you point out where the flame is at? 
Cause not once did I flame him. 

And did something bad?
The Nasus literally went ahead and started int feeding at 2:00 because I pinged him twice to defend my blue.  
15 minutes into the game Nasus had given Urgot 8 kills, and spent a huge amount of time afk in pool harassing me along with 2 premades.


More interested in insulting teammates than playing the game?
No? I hard camped my bot lane so that they snowballed.  
I had to go on Nasus's lane and take down all 3 turrets and the inhib. 
I had to go on bot and take the 3 turrets and inhib. 
I had to solo 2 drakes, and steal the other 2 drakes by myself alone cause the premades refused to cooperate 
I took 2 of 3 turrets on mid.  

So how was I more focused on chat than playing the game, when I was the only one in team trying to win, while the 3 premades were busy flaming me 24/7 for having pinged Nasus twice to go ward / defend blue buff.

>Then can you point out where the flame is at?

Others have. I don't really see a point in that, since you seem intent on explaining away and saying "this isn't toxic" or "they are simple facts" to pretty much every line you direct at Nasus and other teammates that others have pointed out. If you truly want to improve, then I'll point out what lines that I think were negative.

Keep in mind that this chat log alone did not get you permabanned. You've exhibited a consistent history of negativity without reform, and were told that after the 2-week ban that you would be permabanned. Normally, this might have given you a chat restriction, but with having had a 2-week ban prior to this, the next step was losing your account.

Support on Drugs: But I've done 10x more useful things, unlike you. I took 3 turrets, carried bot and mid.
Support on Drugs: All you've done is cry & feed.
Support on Drugs: bronze Nasus

Support on Drugs: I'm the only reason you won bot lane.
Support on Drugs: You were pushed in and losing entire early.
Support on Drugs: I had to camp you guys hard.

Support on Drugs: I was 3/2/5 before this Nasus managed to feed everyone on enemy team.

"wHy DiD I geT bAnneD"

> [{quoted}](name=MagicalDemons,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-03-08T02:29:01.161+0000)
>
> Support on Drugs: But I've done 10x more useful things, unlike you. I took 3 turrets, carried bot and mid.
> Support on Drugs: All you've done is cry & feed.
> Support on Drugs: bronze Nasus
> 
> Support on Drugs: I'm the only reason you won bot lane.
> Support on Drugs: You were pushed in and losing entire early.
> Support on Drugs: I had to camp you guys hard.
> 
> Support on Drugs: I was 3/2/5 before this Nasus managed to feed everyone on enemy team.
> 
> "wHy DiD I geT bAnneD"

? Do you have an intellectual response ?
None of those are even slightly offensive. 

They called me useless, when I was the one who pushed down all the turrets. While Nasus was intentionally feeding & afk entire game. 
They  called me bronze when Nasus was going 1/11/0  and 5 levels behind everyone. While I was ahead of most of the players in the game gold, exp & kda wise.  So I casually responded Nasus Bronze, since A.  everyone in that game was spamming ''Random champ Bronze'' 
And B: Nasus was actually bronze, but was playing in that elo thx to 2 premades being higher elo.

I was the only reason they won bot lane, previous to me starting to camp botside, they had been pushed under turret on low HP since first minion wave, and enemy adc was 2/0 against them both being 0/1. 

I was 3/2/5 before Nasus managed to intentionally feed the entire enemy team. 
And then they flame me for not being able to 1v1 a  10/0 Urgot  when I tried to defend T3 Top turret.


So none of these are offensive things. They are simple facts.

> [{quoted}](name=Support on Drugs,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-03-08T03:42:36.754+0000)
>
> ? Do you have an intellectual response ?
> None of those are even slightly offensive. 
>

No, he doesn't have anything intelligent to say. That's the problem with these hypersensitive report spammers. EVERYTHING you say is offensive to them. Even if all you said was "Hello", they would find that offensive and report you for it. And since this is now an automated system, every report must be assumed to be true, so once you have enough, you're banned.

> [{quoted}](name=TheNthDimention,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=000600000002,timestamp=2018-03-08T06:39:05.526+0000)
>
> And since this is now an automated system, every report must be assumed to be true, so once you have enough, you're banned.

That isn't how the system works. It does not matter how many times you are reported, it only takes one report to flag a game and reports past that don't matter at all.

When you are reported by any number of players the system checks the logs for negative behavior, then adds it to a case against you if it detects any. Once ypur case is full enough it will hit you with a penalty.

In this case since the op was just coming off of a 14 day and was therefore on thin ice, and because these logs show negative behavior, he was hit with the next punishment tier, which is a permanent suspension.

> [{quoted}](name=Support on Drugs,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-03-08T03:42:36.754+0000)
>
> They called me useless, when I was the one who pushed down all the turrets. While Nasus was intentionally feeding & afk entire game. 
> They  called me bronze when Nasus was going 1/11/0  and 5 levels behind everyone. While I was ahead of most of the players in the game gold, exp & kda wise. 

do you think I or riot care what they called you.  You should know that riot or ANYONE else doesn't give a single fuck what they say to you to make you so triggered, and you are responsible for what you say.

" Support on Drugs: But I've done 10x more useful things, unlike you. I took 3 turrets, carried bot and mid.
Support on Drugs: All you've done is cry & feed. "
this is being toxic/flaming.  Don't argue please.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicalDemons,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=000600000001,timestamp=2018-03-08T04:12:37.237+0000)

> " Support on Drugs: But I've done 10x more useful things, unlike you. I took 3 turrets, carried bot and mid.
> Support on Drugs: All you've done is cry & feed. "
> this is being toxic/flaming.  Don't argue please.

No it isn't. Please just go protest for gay rights or something. You fucking SJWs shouldn't be playing video games, especially one rated T for Teen.

I don't understand. SJWs don't play video games, why? I don't think being a fat lard on a computer is exactly manly. Or do people go fishing and hunting after a game of league nowadays? I've never understood how flaming on a video game, yelling at pixels on a screen is in any way manly. In fact, one could say video games are created for those who can't handle the societal pressures of the civilized world.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=00060000000100000000,timestamp=2018-03-08T08:05:33.529+0000)
>
> I don't understand. SJWs don't play video games, why? I don't think being a fat lard on a computer is exactly manly. Or do people go fishing and hunting after a game of league nowadays? I've never understood how flaming on a video game, yelling at pixels on a screen is in any way manly. In fact, one could say video games are created for those who can't handle the societal pressures of the civilized world.

Well said, from someone who's never played sports, or should I say never have been picked to play sports.
Well, I don't play sports. I run track. Since I don't play track, I never play sports.

keep arguing.  It's good to get the frustration out on boards.  Good luck with your next account, since you won't ever get your original one back.

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Context doesn't matter for bans but I'm guessing your hiding the rest of the logs or you recently got off of a 14 ban since if anything this would amount to a new 10 game chat restrict

>Support on Drugs: But I haven't flamed once lmao

I dont see how having passive-aggressive negative attitude toward your jg is any difference from flaming him

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EV08F7Ky,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-07T23:41:36.885+0000)
>
> I dont see how having passive-aggressive negative attitude toward your jg is any difference from flaming him

But I am my Jungler lmao.
totally meant nasus...

I personally don't see a problem with this dialogue. This isn't worth banning someone. My opinion.
Especially with $3,500 invested.

Ask Riot support.

We don't have any power here.

If I had to guess:

Support on Drugs: bronze Nasus
Support on Drugs: Rep me? what about you lol 1/11/0
Support on Drugs: report Nasus
Support on Drugs: I was 3/2/5 before this Nasus managed to feed everyone on enemy team.

+ Arguing, complaining, and general negative attitude.
you see when you do it to me its just hurting my feelings and mean and you're a bully but when i do it it's ok because it's me... yeah ha(this is all a joke)
